PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-13722012-10-18CH,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectCanadian Broadcasting Corporation ** LEASING OF PROPERTY **
PrecisOrder authorizing the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION (as tenant) to enter into a lease agreement with Eurofax Properties Inc. (as landlord) to lease a portion of the building located at 7067 Chebucto Road in Halifax, Nova Scotia for a term of fifteen years, less one day, and including one option to renew the lease for a period of five years. .
AttachmentsAttachment
